example.text: They strip Americans' freedom to work at the job that is best for them. As a result, workers are losing out on nearly $300 billion in wages every year.

Hearings are opportunities to push Congress toward solutions. Today, [[user]] held a hearing on my Trust in Government Act, which would modernize how agencies serve Americans. Democrats and Republicans should be able to agree on bringing our government into the 21st century. [[url]]

The violence in and around Gaza is a tragedy for Israeli and Palestinian families. I condemn the terror attacks, which slow diplomacy and make peace harder. US leadership, including support for Iron Dome, should continue to promote deescalation and prevent further loss of life.
